Bill Russell, who spent many of his formative years in the Bay Area, was a true giant in the game of basketball, and more importantly, in the game of life. 

While the accolades on the court were immense, it was his overall impact as a pioneer that will leave the greatest legacy. https://t.co/dfWxKDPW1q

To be the greatest champion in your sport, to revolutionize the way the game is played, and to be a societal leader all at once seems unthinkable, but that is who Bill Russell was. (1/4) https://t.co/K0Ue0hKiLs
